<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Olethrodaemon (Apocalypse Daemon)](/Monsters.aspx?ID=597)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Even daemons fear the most massive and terrifying of their kind, olethrodaemons. No single entity could embody the level of evil necessary to manifest one; instead, these living war machines are made from the souls of many—or so the story goes. Other theories suggest that the four Horsemen of the Apocalypse are responsible for creating the olethrodaemons, or that olethrodaemons are merely the seeping run-off of an even greater being: a mysterious fifth Horseman.

Whatever the truth, olethrodaemons are real, and their existence is terrifying enough to instill paralyzing existential dread. With dozens of unblinking glowing eyes above a drooling maw, two sets of four muscled limbs, and countless horns, olethrodaemons resemble no other creature known to mortalkind.

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 63 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +33; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [tremorsense (imprecise) 120 feet](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=40), [_true seeing_](/Spells.aspx?ID=344)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Daemonic](/Languages.aspx?ID=31); [telepathy 100 feet](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +40, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +38, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +34

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +10

**Dex** +6

**Con** +7

**Int** +2

**Wis** +6

**Cha** +8
</row>

**Items**
soul gem (4)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 44 

**Fort** +35 

**Ref** +32 

**Will** +34 

+1 status to all saves vs. magic
</row>

**HP** 450

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects

**Weaknesses**
good 20

**Aura of Doom** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48)) 60 feet. Any creature that begins its turn in the aura is [doomed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9) for as long as it remains in the aura and for 1 hour thereafter.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 35 feet, burrow 35 feet, fly 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +38 ([Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 4d12+17 piercing plus 1d6 evil and [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +38 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 4d8+17 slashing plus 1d6 evil and [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 42, attack +34
- **1st**
[Detect Alignment](/Spells.aspx?ID=65) (good only; at will)
- **4th**
[Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69) (at will)
- **5th**
[Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69)
- **9th**
[Disintegrate](/Spells.aspx?ID=76) (×3), [Disjunction](/Spells.aspx?ID=77), [Wail of the Banshee](/Spells.aspx?ID=361)
- **10th**
[Cataclysm](/Spells.aspx?ID=32), [Massacre](/Spells.aspx?ID=186)
- **Constant (10th)**
[True Seeing](/Spells.aspx?ID=344)

**Rituals** DC 42

- **9th**
[Control Weather](/Rituals.aspx?ID=9)

**Apocalypse Breath** <actions string="Two Actions or Three Actions" /> ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Negative](/Traits.aspx?ID=118)) The daemon expels a shrieking black cloud of smoke from its mouth in a 120-foot line or a 60-foot cone (or both a line and a cone in the same direction if it spends 3 actions). Living creatures in the area take 24d6 negative damage (DC 45 basic Reflex save). The olethrodaemon can't use Apocalypse Breath again for 1d4 rounds.

**Soul Crush** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Requirement** The olethrodaemon has a soul gem; **Effect** The olethrodaemon crushes the soul gem in one hand and regains the use of Apocalypse Breath or any one of its innate spells.

**[Swallow Whole](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=35)** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15)) Huge, 4d10+10 bludgeoning and [drained 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10), Rupture 43. An olethrodaemon has numerous stomachs connected by labyrinthine digestive organs. Swallowed creatures cannot [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79), but can attempt to cut their way out with a 1d6 roll. On a roll of 1–3, the creature cuts into yet another stomach. On a roll of 4–6, the creature manages to cut its way out of the olethrodaemon.

</column>
